16.4
Bank of America shall pay Supplier for all services and applicable taxes invoiced In arrears in accordance with the terms of this Agreement,
within sixty (60) calendar days of the date of receipt of a valid and correct invoice by Bank of America. Bank of America reserves the right to
pay prior to the expiration of the sixty (60) day period. If Bank of America pays within thirty (30) calendar days of receipt of a valid invoice
by Bank of America, a discount of two percent (2%) will be subtracted from the total invoice amount for Services.
perturbation.changed_text:
16.4
Bank of America shall pay Supplier for all services and applicable taxes invoiced In arrears in accordance with the terms of this Agreement,
within ninety (90) calendar days of the date of receipt of a valid and correct invoice by Bank of America. Bank of America reserves the right to
pay prior to the expiration of the sixty (60) day period. If Bank of America pays within thirty (30) calendar days of receipt of a valid invoice
by Bank of America, a discount of two percent (2%) will be subtracted from the total invoice amount for Services.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction by changing the payment terms. Initially, Bank of America is supposed to pay within **60 days** of receiving a valid invoice. After the change, the payment is supposed to be made in **90 days** of a valid invoice receipt, thereby contradicting the initial clause.

perturbation.changed_text:
4.1
This Agreement shall apply and remain in effect from the Effective Date and for a period of one (1) year, renewable annually, unless terminated pursuant to the Section

perturbation.explanation: The modified text creates an in-text contradiction by changing the term. Initially, the agreement remains in effect perpetually. After the change, the term of the agreement is only valid for a year, which is in contradiction to the intial term length.
